Posts.Content: Hi I was on tamoxafen for 2 years and have been on aromacin for 2 months.  The joint pains are unbearable, I am very active and do lots of excercise and am trying to work through the pain.  I am going to ask if I can come off it and go back on tamoxafen.   Babs
Posts.Title: Has Anyone Been on Aromasin and Are They Getting Side Effects?
